nodes.text: A guard unit of death troopers of the Galactic Empire was active on Lothal and were tasked with guarding Minister Veris Hydan, a close Imperial Advisor of Emperor Palpatine.

As a guard unit consisting of several death troopers that was led by Minister Veris Hydan, a close advisor of the Force for Emperor Palpatine, the unit was tasked with supporting the excavation of the Lothal Jedi Temple.
